# Uppgift 1

```{r}
P <- matrix(c(0, 0, 0, 0.4, 0, 0.6,
0.1, 0.1, 0, 0.4, 0, 0.4,
0, 0.2, 0.2, 0.3, 0, 0.3,
0, 0, 0.3, 0.5, 0, 0.2,
0, 0, 0, 0.4, 0.6, 0,
0, 0, 0, 0, 0.5, 0.5),
nrow = 6,
ncol = 6,
byrow = TRUE)

mpow <- function(A, n) {
resultat <- diag(nrow(A))
potens <- n
while (potens > 0) {
resultat <- A %*% resultat
potens <- potens - 1
}
return(resultat)
}

Res <- mpow(P,4)
Res2 <- mpow(P,7)
Res3 <- mpow(P,14)
Res4 <- mpow(P,90)

print(Res[6,])
```
